tests.test_email_sender module

Email Sender Module Test Suite

Comprehensive test coverage for utils/email_sender.py module including: - Configuration validation - Email sending functionality - Error handling scenarios - Environment variable handling - Development mode testing - Production mode simulation - URL encoding and formatting
